cli.description: Runs the CLI for AOC -- for more help run `deno task cli -h`

coverage.description: Runs the coverage report to STDOUT

coverage:lcov.description: Generates an lcov report from the coverage data

coverage:html.description:
Converts the lcov report into an HTML view
    -- IMPORTANT NOTE -- This may require having `lcov` installed locally on your machine

coverage:html:full.description: Runs tests, generates both LCOV and HTML reports, and opens the HTML report in a browser
coverage:html:full.command: deno task test:coverage && deno task coverage:lcov && deno task coverage:html && deno run --allow-run ./open_coverage_report.ts
